p: \bWould you like to challenge the Pokemon League?
\bOK! Because you are on the \rEasy \bdifficulty, you can both use items and use shift mode.
\bOK! Because you are on the \rNormal \bdifficulty, you can use items, but you will be in Set mode during battle.
\bOK! Because you are on the \rHard \bdifficulty, you can't use items, and you will be in Set mode during battle.
\bThe Pokemon League is a difficult and climactic challenge- the final test for any trainer!
\bYou'll need to battle the Elite Four all at once, in a row, in any order you choose, followed by our Champion.
\bDepending on your difficulty, you might not be able to use items in battle, or be allowed to use the "Switch" battle format.
\bHowever, feel free to use your items to heal up all you need in between battles!
\bActually... we're not quite ready for your Elite Four rematches yet.
\bWould you like to challenge the Pokemon League?
\bThe Pokemon League is a difficult and climactic challenge- the final test for any trainer!
\bYou'll need to battle the Elite Four all at once, in a row, in any order you choose, followed by our Champion.
\bYou won't be able to use items in battle, or be allowed to use the "Switch" battle format.
\bHowever, feel free to use your items to heal up all you need in between battles!
\bWould you like to challenge the Pokemon League? We have a new Champion now, we're ready for your rematches!
\bThe Pokemon League is a difficult and climactic challenge- the final test for any trainer!
\bYou'll need to battle the Elite Four all at once, in a row, in any order you choose, followed by our Champion.
\bYou won't be able to use items in battle, or be allowed to use the "Switch" battle format.
\bHowever, feel free to use your items to heal up all you need in between battles!
\bAnd now, since Reukra left, we have a brand new Champion from the Vesryn Region!
\bI hope you're ready to take them on!
\rAre you really gonna take on the Elite Four?
\rI'm sorry to say you don't stand a chance. They're the strongest trainers of all time!
\bI thought I saw the Champion walk in earlier.
\bIt was hard to tell if they were a boy or a girl, but let me tell you- they didn't look like a pushover!
\rLittle is known about the PokeRus except that they
\r\pn, your Nuzlocke Challenge is over.\nThank you for participating.\nWe will revive your dead Pokemon, however, this Challenge is no longer considered a
Nuzlocke Challenge and you are considered to have failed.\nI'm sorry.
\bHey kid... do you want some Honey?
\bHopefully you find a use for it.
\bHopefully you find a use for it.
\bFair warning, friend. Make sure your team is ready.
\bYou know, diverse teams, maybe some status conditions, a Choice Scarf or revenge killer.
\bOr a Roar or Haze user. Or a Ghost-type. Or
\bThe Elite Four are hard, but beatable. Just make sure you're ready for it- this is your last chance!
\bI'm sure you're wondering what the heck I'm doing here and as much as I hate to break your immersion in this game by breaking the fourth wall, I'm here to
distribute some special Pokemon to you as a placeholder for events that we'll be implementing in the next update since I know that most of you are tired of waiting
for them to be made available.
\bOf course, as with the guy sitting across the room from me, I can't just give you these Pokemon without you going through a bit of trouble first.
\bSo go ahead and beat the Elite Four and Champion without having any of your Pokemon faint. No, you don't need to do this again if you already did it prior to this
\bWell done. Take these as your reward.
\bDon't worry about me, I'll just be sitting here waiting for you for the next few months until you fulfill my conditions.
\bUh, you do realize I have nothing else to give you, right?
\bHmm... you seem like a fine upstanding trainer.
\bYou know- the Elite Four is hard enough to beat on their own, but let me give you a challenge.
\bIf you can beat the Elite Four and Champion without any Pokemon fainting at all, I'll give you a special prize!
\bWh-whoa! You actually did it! That's incredible.
\bWow. Listen, I think you'll be a much better fit to take care of this Pokemon than I am.
\bTalk to me if you can pull that off.
\bPlease take very good care of my Pokemon!
